application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to conditions 4(M4(2) & M4(3) requirement), 14 (Travel plan statement), 17 (Hard and soft landscape details), 19 (Details of external materials), 20 (Boiler details), 22 (External lighting details), 23 (EV charging details), 25 (Boundary treatments), 26 (Details for bird and bat boxes) and 27 (Details of satellite dish) of Variation of Conditions application reference dated 25th Feb 2025 for Variation of conditions 2 (approved drawings), 26 (details of hard and soft landscaping) and 30 (number of homes) to allow for the following:ÿerection of an additional floor providing 8 new flatsinstallation of PV panels to the roofincrease the number of cycle parking spaces from 97 to 115ÿof variation of conditions reference 22/3347 dated 19th September 2023 relating to Full Planning Permission reference 15/5564 dated 03/03/2020 for Demolition of the existing office building Trinity House and to construct residential units, together with onsite car parking, landscaping and amenity space (amended description), subject to Deed of Agreement dated 26 March 2020 under Section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended (and subsequent Deed of Variation dated 14th October 2021, a further Deed of Variation Dated 15th June 2023 and a further Deed of Variation dated 20th of February 2025.
site_name: Former Trinity House, Heather Park Drive, Wembley
